TopicTitle: Kerbals EVA's UI is all ''new text''

Articles.Content:
Hi,

So I re-installed KSP twice and the problem persist on both new and old saves. Whenever I perform an EVA and right-click my kerbals to take a report or a sample, the UI is bugged and only shows buttons written ''NEW TEXT''. I can click the third one to ''sucessfully'' take a report. But, when i get back in the ship i cannot right click anything else (thrusters, goo canister, thermometer, etc.). Sometimes i can't even recover my vessel upon landing.

pretty annoying bug.

thanks for your time.
